price: No falsehood can approach it from the front or from behind; a revelation from the One Who is All-Wise, Praiseworthy.
arabic: لَّا يَأۡتِيهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَلَا مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦۖ تَنزِيلٞ مِّنۡ حَكِيمٍ حَمِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
